# Choppleganger - Find Your Ugly Celebrity Twin

> Choppleganger is an iOS app that uses AI to match your selfie with celebrities at their worst moments. Upload a photo, get roasted, share the chaos.

## About

Choppleganger (also searched as: choppelganger, doppleganger, doppelganger, chopleganger, choplganger) is a fun, viral iOS application that uses advanced facial recognition AI to find which celebrity you resemble - but not their glamorous red carpet photos. Instead, we match you with paparazzi shots, awkward moments, and unflattering angles.

The app is designed for entertainment and social sharing, particularly popular on TikTok and Instagram with the #ChopplegangerChallenge hashtag.

## Key Features

- AI-powered face matching against 10,000+ celebrity photos
- Focus on unflattering, funny celebrity moments
- Match percentage scoring (e.g., "94% match to Nicolas Cage confused at airport")
- One-tap sharing to TikTok, Instagram, Snapchat
- Emotion and vibe analysis
- Multiple matches per scan (up to 10 celebrity twins)
- Save and compare results over time

## Pricing

- 3-day free trial
- $6.99/week subscription (Choppleganger Premium)
- Cancel anytime through Apple App Store

## Privacy

- Photos used only for matching, stored only during active subscription
- All user data permanently deleted when subscription ends
- No data retention after subscription termination
- Secure processing with encryption

## Company

Choppleganger is developed by Wave Tech LLC.

Contact: pranav@wavetechhq.com

## Common Search Terms

People searching for this app may use:
- choppleganger
- choppelganger (typo)
- doppleganger app
- doppelganger celebrity app
- ugly celebrity twin app
- celebrity lookalike app
- AI face match celebrity
- find my celebrity twin
- celebrity match app iOS
- who do i look like celebrity
- celebrity doppelganger finder
